title: Enhancing App Development Practical Skills: Self-Determination Enhancement and Educational Outcomes Through Supportive Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of educational psychology, understanding of primary curriculum, and online learning environment experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain design principles for supportive learning environments based on Self-Determination Theory
Learners can implement at least three practical instructional strategies that promote student engagement in online LMS environments

Learners develop one education design plan reflecting Self-Determination Theory (SDT) for elementary learners (ages 8–13) through 1–6 months of project-based assessment, and validate educational outcome relevance via peer and instructor evaluations (meeting ≥4/5 rubric criteria).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
